text.div:
DMERC Line Pricing State Code (SSA)

The 2-digit SSA state code where the durable medical equipment (DME) supplier was located; used by the Medicare Administrative Contractor (MAC) for pricing the service. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/dmerclineprcngstatecd

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in https://bluebutton.cms.gov/assets/ig/CodeSystem-dmerc-line-prcng-state-cd

name: DMERC Line Pricing State Code (SSA)
description: The 2-digit SSA state code where the durable medical equipment (DME) supplier was located; used by the Medicare Administrative Contractor (MAC) for pricing the service. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/dmerc_line_prcng_state_cd
